price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߊߣߌ߲ ߓߍ߯ ߦߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ‹ ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ › ߠߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ، ߞߏ߬ߣߵߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߬
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
